name: Words Hurt (HairyTea)
description:
=_= Words Hurt =_=

This game was made in Unity for a College project on Emotions in games or an "Emotive" Game. The player must decide on which words are bad, which are good and which should be neutral. Set in a coffee shop with headphones to drown out the noise of the people that surrounds you, your anxiety hits. Now you must sort out the words you think are thrown at you. You must try your hardest to stay happy and not let these words get to you.

Words Hurt was created to show what a form of anxiety can look like, which can make the happiest person in the world go to being the saddest.
